≈ûamaxƒ± ‚Äì Q…ôb…ôl…ô ‚Äì ≈ûahdaƒü mar≈ürutu √∂lk…ônin …ôn m…ônz…ôr…ôli gu≈ü…ôl…ôrini …ôhat…ô edir ‚Äî ≈ûirvan diyarƒ±nƒ±n q…ôdim abid…ôl…ôrind…ôn tutmu≈ü Qafqaz daƒülarƒ±nƒ±n f√ºsunkar m…ônz…ôr…ôl…ôrin…ô q…ôd…ôr.

Daha sonra yol Q…ôb…ôl…ôy…ô uzanƒ±r ‚Äî Az…ôrbaycanƒ±n turizm paytaxtƒ±, burada sizi daƒü m…ônz…ôr…ôl…ôri, Nohurg√∂l g√∂l√º, ≈ü…ôlal…ôl…ôr v…ô Tufandaƒü kanat yolu g√∂zl…ôyir. Mar≈ürutun son dayanacaƒüƒ± is…ô ≈ûahdaƒüdƒ±r ‚Äî beyn…ôlxalq s…ôviyy…ôli m√ºasir daƒü-xiz…ôk kurortu, t…ômiz hava, aktiv istirah…ôt v…ô Qafqaz zirv…ôl…ôrinin …ôz…ôm…ôti il…ô dolu bir m…ôkandƒ±r.
short.en:
Discover the beauty of Azerbaijan, where ancient history meets breathtaking nature and modern comfort.
The Shamakhi ‚Äì Gabala ‚Äì Shahdaq route showcases some of the most scenic corners of the country ‚Äî from the historical heritage of Shirvan to the stunning landscapes of the Caucasus Mountains.

Your journey begins in Shamakhi, an ancient city famous for its Juma Mosque, Diri Baba Mausoleum, and rich cultural legacy. Continue to Gabala, the tourism capital of Azerbaijan, offering mountain panoramas, waterfalls, Lake Nohur, and the Tufandag cable car. The final stop is Shahdaq, a world-class ski resort that combines fresh mountain air, adventure, and tranquility amidst the Caucasus peaks.

short.az: Naftalan ≈ü…ôh…ôri Az…ôrbaycanƒ±n saƒülamlƒ±q m…ôrk…ôzi adlandƒ±rƒ±lƒ±r, √ß√ºnki burada x√ºsusi naftalan nefti tapƒ±lƒ±b. M…ôlum olub ki, bu neft yanmƒ±r, y…ôni yanacaq kimi istifad…ô oluna bilm…ôz. Lakin naftalan nefti unikal m√ºalic…ôvi x√ºsusiyy…ôtl…ôr…ô malikdir v…ô 70-d…ôn √ßox x…ôst…ôliyin m√ºalic…ôsind…ô k√∂m…ôk edir!
short.en: The city of Naftalan is often called Azerbaijan‚Äôs health resort, as it became famous for its special Naftalan oil. It turns out that this oil does not burn, so it cannot be used as fuel. However, Naftalan oil has unique healing properties and helps in the treatment of more than 70 types of diseases!

short.en: Baku Shopping Tour is the perfect blend of shopping, art, and unique experiences. Over 5 days, you will explore the historical markets and handicraft workshops of the Old City, as well as modern malls featuring luxury brands. Scenic strolls, local wine tasting, visits to unusual museums and architectural landmarks will make your tour not only entertaining but also stylish. This tour is ideal for shopping enthusiasts as well as those who want to discover the unusual side of Baku.

details.en:
Day 1 ‚Äî Arrival & First Impression
‚Ä¢ Meet at the airport, private transfer to hotel.
‚Ä¢ Free time for rest.

Day 2 ‚Äî Old City + Art Shopping
‚Ä¢ Excursion to Icherisheher: Maiden Tower, Shirvanshah Palace.
‚Ä¢ Visit handicraft workshops ‚Äî carpets, copper, ceramics, unique souvenirs.
‚Ä¢ Muhammad Mosque (Sinig Gala).
‚Ä¢ Caravanserais.
‚Ä¢ Evening: wine tasting.

Day 3 ‚Äî Modern Shopping
‚Ä¢ Visit Port Baku Mall ‚Äî luxury brands.
‚Ä¢ Ganjlik Mall.
‚Ä¢ Deniz Mall (shopping & entertainment).
‚Ä¢ Evening: ride on Baku Eye (Ferris Wheel).
‚Ä¢ Night walk along Nizami Street (boutiques, brands, souvenirs).

Day 4 ‚Äî Unusual Baku
‚Ä¢ Museum of Miniature Books (unique in the world).
‚Ä¢ Museum of Modern Art ‚Äî avant-garde & abstraction.
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúLittle Venice‚Äù.
‚Ä¢ Upland Park (best panoramic view).

Day 5 ‚Äî Architectural Surprise
‚Ä¢ Heydar Aliyev Center ‚Äî must-see.
‚Ä¢ Unique photo spots: Soviet Baku (old neighborhoods, graffiti & street art).
‚Ä¢ Zoroastrian Fire Temple (Ateshgah) + Burning Mountain (Yanar Dag).

Day 6 ‚Äî Departure
‚Ä¢ Breakfast, transfer to the airport.

short.en:
Gobustan Rock Engravings: Over 6,000 petroglyphs depicting animals, humans, bulls, boats, and sun symbols, dating from 5,000 to 20,000 years ago.

Mud Volcanoes: More than 300 mud volcanoes, with eruptions accompanied by strong explosions and underground rumblings.

Bibi-Eybat Mosque: A historic mosque located on the Caspian Sea coast.

Ateshgah Fire Temple: A sacred site for Zoroastrians where the fire burns continuously.

Yanar Dag: A mountain with natural gas flames burning for many years.

‚Ä¢ All excursions according to the program ‚Äì private
‚Ä¢ Entrance tickets: cable car in Gabala (2 lines), cable car in Shahdag
‚Ä¢ Daily breakfast at the hotel
The price is calculated for 2 people.
